relproducts.title: Marble Fresco - Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Flint is a colour that's very much in right now, so why not go in search of an original way to introduce it? Marble fresco is their unique take on the problem, and it combines an earthy colour with a subtly shimmering pattern that shines through into the foreground. The interesting thing about fresco is that it enables you to add a calming influence to your room, but still leaves you with plenty of scope to introduce lighter colours.

relproducts.title: Malta Charcoal Curtain
relproducts.description: Malta is one of their most popular fabric collections. Malta charcoal is a dark, statement grey shade. An elegant hue that will work well with modern grey interiors. Grey is a stylish choice, and a trend that's not looking to go anywhere just yet. This fabric is beautiful for living rooms, dining rooms or bedrooms. Their made to measure curtains are all handmade within the uk and will provide a touch of luxury to your interior styling.

relproducts.title: Urban Metallic Limestone Curtain
relproducts.description: Urban comes in several modern grey and cream shades, this hopsack range adds modern simplicity to your kitchen or bedroom.
